meaning_str.bing:
n. 艺术；技术；技巧；表演艺术
v. 对一人讲话时用
网络. 艺术(Artistic)；美术；辅助生殖技术(assisted reproductive technology)

艺术；技术；技巧；表演艺术

艺术；美术；美术作品；艺术作品；艺术技巧；技艺；技术；手艺；工艺；（arts）人文科学；文科
美术品的；艺术品的；美术家的；艺术家的

sogou-kaoyan.n: 艺术[出现15次)];人文科学; 文科[出现7次)];技艺[出现2次)]

sogou-CET6.n: 艺术[出现36次)];技艺[出现1次)]

sogou-CET4.n: 艺术[出现32次)];人文学科[出现5次)];技艺[出现2次)]

1.en: It was a time that produced some of the greatest thought and art that the world has ever known.
1.cn: 这段时期中，希腊产生了人类历史上最伟大的思想和艺术瑰宝。

2.en: Ah you say art, art of what you know, the hair from a non-slip coated with a yellow autumn you artists you, you have to feather friends.
2.cn: 你丫说艺术，懂艺术么你，把自个头发涂个黄不溜秋的你就艺术家啦，就得瑟啦。

3.en: It is followed by the fifth part which deals with how the concept of regional features can be utilized in modern environment art design.
3.cn: 第五部分结合部分实例分析了现代环境艺术如何利用地域特征进行设计的概念与方法。

0.cn: 这不是食物，这是艺术品。

1.en: Well, I saw you working on your art project.
1.cn: 可是我看到你做你的艺术课项目了。

2.en: Well, on the bright side, you've invented window art.
2.cn: 嘿，往好的方面想， 你发明了窗户艺术。

3.en: Your mother's photos are important works of art, Erik.
3.cn: 你母亲拍摄的照片是珍贵的艺术品，埃里克。

4.en: You're in a work of art. I think a lot of people would love to be in a work of art.
4.cn: 你的形象出现在一幅艺术品里，我觉得很多人都会喜欢出现在艺术作品中。

5.en: She spent three hundred dollars on art supplies. You're not an artist.
5.cn: 她花了三百块买艺术用品。你又不是艺术家。

6.en: Of a naked photo of my client. Renowned piece of art.
6.cn: 那可是我当事人的裸照。是一幅著名艺术品。

7.en: Do you know what I used to do before I had you? Art. I wanted to be an artist when I grew up.
7.cn: 你知道我生你之前是做什么的吗？搞艺术的。我小时候的理想是当一名艺术家。

8.en: Excuse me. I've been to the art section of Bed, Bath & Beyond.
8.cn: 不好意思，我倒是去过家居店的艺术品区。

9.en: Nowadays, much of this art is available for everyone to enjoy.
9.cn: 时至今日，园内有很多艺术巨作供大家欣赏。

10.en: Fair enough, but in its essence, teaching is a performance art.
10.cn: 没错，但是从本质上来讲教书是一门表演艺术。

11.en: The promenade is home to some of the territories premier arts institutions, like the Museum of Art and the Hong Kong Cultural Centre.
11.cn: 海滨公园是一些顶级艺术馆的所在地，当中包括香港艺术馆和香港文化中心。

12.en: The theater is a temple of art. A precious cornucopia of creative energy.
12.cn: 剧场是艺术的殿堂，剧场能孕育出珍贵的创造力。

13.en: Folding is a real art. The more folds, the better the dim sum chef.
13.cn: 包饺子是一种真正的艺术，折皱包得越多的点心师傅就越好。

14.en: Just a short stroll away is the world's greatest treasure-house of art, the Musee du Louvre.
14.cn: 再散步一小段路，眼前就是世界上最伟大的艺术宝藏，卢浮宫。

15.en: You had time to finish your little art project, but you didn't have time to finish your chores?
15.cn: 你有时间完成你那个小艺术品，但是却没有时间做完家务吗？

16.en: Oh, but I've got tickets to the Van Gogh exhibit. I've been waiting like a year for this. Art lover.
16.cn: 我也买了梵高画展的票，我盼了一年才盼到。艺术爱好者。

17.en: Or, a guerilla art exhibit in dumbo? Or, hey, isn't the New York film festival still going on?
17.cn: 或者是一场边缘艺术展？还是？对了，纽约电影节还没结束吧？

18.en: What'd you say? I said art lover. Is that supposed to be an insult? I don't know, I'm very tired.
18.cn: 你说什么？我说艺术爱好者。那是用来侮辱人的吗？不知道，我很累了。

19.en: I've never seen a gorilla drive a car before, but if you put it in a museum, I'm not gonna call it art.
19.cn: 我没见过猩猩开车，但这也不说明把它放在博物馆里就能变成艺术品。
